titleStmt.title: By the Queene. Where it is ordeined and prouided by a statute made [and] established in the Parliament holden at Westminster the viii. day of Iune. in the xxviii. yeere of the reigne of the Queenes Maiesties dearely beloued father of famous memorie King Henry the eight, that the prices of all kind of wines ... should be limitted and declared ...
Proclamations. 1578-11-24
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

titleStmt.title: By the Queene. Where it is ordeined and prouided by a statute made [and] established in the Parliament holden at Westminster the viii. day of Iune. in the xxviii. yeere of the reigne of the Queenes Maiesties dearely beloued father of famous memorie King Henry the eight, that the prices of all kind of wines ... should be limitted and declared ...
Proclamations. 1578-11-24
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes Maiestie [i.e. B. Norton and J. Bill],

notesStmt.note: Sets the prices of French wine.
Actual printers' names and suggested publication date from STC.
Identified as STC 8104 on UMI microfilm reel 564.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
